message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $15,000.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can we meet in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product's value to me is quite high. How about we meet halfway between our offers at $12,000?
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to pay $10,500. Can you meet me at this price?
